name: RoboSphere
description:
Shoot the drone!

One gun is never enough to get the job done!

Keep moving and keep shooting!

Earn points. Unlock weapons. Blast Em'. Repeat.

Your loadout consist of pistol, shotgun, assault rifle, grenade launcher, and minigun.

Control:

  • W-A-S-D: Movement
  • Q-E: Weapons selection
  • SpaceBar: Dash/Boost
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Tab: Upgrade List

Software:

  • Unity
  • Maya
  • Photoshop CC
  • Substance Designer
  • Visual Studio
  • GitKraken
  • Audacity

Pre -Jam Assets

  • Guns model (Pistol, shotgun, assault rifle, and minigun) from past projects.

Online Resources

  • freesound.org
  • zapsplat.com
  • fesliyanstudio.com
  • dafont.com
